content.Description: Campaign Status to filter on. Defaults to 'Active' alternatives are ACTIVE, DELETED, PAUSED
Defaults to today minus 365, only used for the stats endpointNote that the Campaign Performance Stats stream will only go back a total of 365 days.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
